meta.ip: It's not know who wrote this letter, but it was sent to a group of Jewish believers named also of Hebrews. Written this because so that their faith would be strengthened tenged because nana-nasian e the difficulty eg-antusen dan and in-el-elehan the faith ran ki the messiah. Sikan naa, imbagget them of talagsulat concerning the faith ran and impanulu din them of Yeshua the messiah the true/correct and the ending impakita of God of people here of ampew of land.

Ne due this the three truth mig-ay-ayaran din of teach: (1) Yeshua the ware bunsuranan and ware final Anak of God. Ne greatest pad sikandin of prophets, messengers, and minsan ki Moses. (2) Yeshua the impeila of God ware final priest. Labew sikandin of me priest there to Tapey Kasabutan. (3) Ne by means of Yeshua, the believed kandin egkaluwas of sale and of death.

The faith of famous Hebrews from long ago is written about in chapter 11. Sikan naa, imbagget of talagsulat the believers strengthen of their faith. Ne there to chapter 12, imbagget din again them continue the egmatinumanen until final, iyan just egtengtengan Yeshua. Igpaantus again them the me difficulty and the paying-bayad egginguma them. But it's necessary egkatahaan dan that all, pegdisiplina just them of God isip children din. Mig-impusan din this letter by means of advice din and warning rin.
